messages.title: Daniel Zeichner will always stick to his principles and never sell out.
messages.content: He will protect our public services. He got the secret NHS privatising department shut down. Labour says big businesses must pay their fair share.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Daniel will fight for our schools and hospitals.
He got the secret NHS privatising department shut down.
Labour says big businesses must pay their fair share.
Daniel always votes to 'Remain' and for voting reform.

mentions.candidate: Daniel always votes to 'Remain' and for voting reform. Whatever the party line is, Daniel puts Cambridge first.

issues.economy: Labour says big businesses must pay their fair share.
issues.education: Daniel will fight for our schools.

leaflet.personalStatement: Daniel Zeichner will always stick to his principles and never sell out. He will protect our public services. Daniel will fight for our schools and hospitals.

examples: Tim Farron's Lib Dem candidate voted with the Tories 782 times.
